page.title: 08ANNUAL CUSTOMS IN BUNNY
page.content: Many of the old customs once held in Bunny have died out. However, an old custom new to Bunny is the{Shrove {Tuesday Pancake Race.}It is held in Main Street. Girls, boys and adults take part in the race. They run down the street to the finishing line and there the winners get a prize. The{Strawberry Fayre}is held in July every year when the Strawberries are ripe. Strawberries and cream are served for tea and everyone can play games and buy produce and secondhand goods. Another new event is the annual {Fun Run}organised by the Rancliffe Arms sports and social club. All ages from Bunny and Bradmore run in a 3.5 miles race around Bunny Park. On the 31st. October a{Hallowe'en Party}is held for children who dress as ghosts and witches. They play many games like 'apple bobbing' and 'trick or treat'.
